text:
Hi everyone, :wave: I’m Koen Van Lysebetten, Head of Growth & Growth mentor. I’ve been turning brands into conversion machines since 2003. :rocket:

I love short HIIT workouts, I play Call off Duty (a lot) and I love to read biographies. I prefer mountains & lakes over beaches. In the morning, I start my day with a cold shower, followed by a refreshing and healthy energy lift of Matcha-Latte

I’ve started & scaled growth teams for multiple eCommerce businesses, run hundreds of experiments across every area of the funnel, and made a million mistakes along the way.
Anyone can get lucky and launch a successful experiment. Yet, very few can consistently create sustainable growth. Don’t just take my word for it: in less than a year, I scaled GIMBER’s MoM by 168% and grew Kazidomi’s MRR from 600K to 1.2m.

My expertise: #SEO #CRO #leadership #growth #socialads #ppc

• Identify and test new customer acquisition opportunities.
• Identify opportunities and run experiments to increase customer retention.
• Built a data-driven culture designed to extract and act upon key learnings.
• I love to turn brands into the WIKIPEDIA of their segment.
• Build a holistic growth culture within the company aligned around a NSM.
• Hire and develop new growth talent - you can always do more with more.
• Mentor, coach, and inspire the overall growth team
• And so much more!!
Happy to part of this great community. :pray: Feel free to DM me or connect also with me on Linkedin:  <https://www.linkedin.com/in/koenvanlysebetten/>

text: Hello! Not all of our members are guys. In an effort to be more conscious of the language we use to address each other, why not try “Hey, folks,” or “Hey everyone” instead?

Hey-o! I'm a Columbus, OH based writer, too!

Let's connect sometime and, dare I say, maybe even meet in person!? I'll shoot you a connect on LI, Stefanie!
